forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 54. West wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 5 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the city of San Francisco basks in the early morning glow, the air remains refreshingly crisp and clear. Beneath a starlit sky, the temperature holds steady near a comfortable 54 degrees, while gentle breezes weave through the streets, whispering promises of a sunny day ahead. Residents can expect the sun to rise, casting its radiant warmth over the bustling downtown, setting the stage for a high of near 70 as the day transitions. A delightful blue expanse will envelop the city, with only wisps of potential marine layer lingering in the distance, hinted at by the west northwest winds stirring between 5 and 20 mph, lending a slight thrill to the atmosphere.

This pleasant weather invites one to slip into light layers—perhaps a long-sleeved shirt or a light jacket, easily shed as the warmth builds. Take the time to stroll through the lively neighborhoods, where coffee shops buzz with the morning ritual of patrons savoring aromatic brews. A leisurely walk along the waterfront promises stunning vistas, the Golden Gate Bridge a bold silhouette against the expanse of blue. With bustling farmers' markets and charming boutiques waiting to be explored, the day lies open for quiet wanderings and indulgent brunches in the glow of a glorious San Francisco afternoon.
